Room.Name: Riverdell Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Riverdell Way, east of a couple of small shops.
Room.LongDescription: Directly to the west, you can see Hanabal's Light Swords shop, where some inexpensive, but useful swords and daggers may be purchased. To the south a little bit is the Panthor Academy of the Fighting Arts, where galiant, aspiring Fighters go to train during their first few months of experience.
